name: The Dragon Queen (itch)
description:
"Legend has it that a great warrior will one day return the dragon eggs of the 3 Ancient Ones to the same lands where dragons once roamed free. A great crown of ancient and mysterious power will be revealed to them after all 3 eggs were placed in a tomb whose whereabouts are unknown. This warrior would forever be known as the Dragon King.

Centuries have passed and the Legend of the Dragon King remains simply hearsay. Many warriors and heroes gave up on the quest long ago. The dragon eggs remain hidden, as does the crown. Will you be the one worthy of earning its power?

Your name is Mara Dragonstar. You have grown up in a family of heroes who have tried and failed to find all of the missing dragon eggs. For years you trained with your father until the arrival of your 18th birthday, today, in which you are to embark on your quest to claim the Dragon Crown.

Your fellow trainees have ridiculed you for years for being a female warrior. Many believe the crown belongs to a King, not a Queen. You hope you can prove them wrong. Let the Ancient Ones guide you to fulfill whatever destiny has intended."

The Dragon Queen is a short single-player fantasy RPG experience.
